I have been unable to reproduce the exception, but i had just opened a file in
the class file editor and was invoking the quick outline.  The class was
BinaryMethod from JDT Core.  The file doesn't seem to be corrupted.

Build id: I20050222-0821

I have had this happen again, but this time it came from the semantic hilighter
thread.  I had just opened the workspace and the Java editor was open on a
binary file.

Reading through the code the only way this could happen is if two threads try to
use the MethodInfo at the same time.  T1 is half way through lazily initialising
the exceptionTypeNames (ut has set the field) and T2 thinks they have been
initialised (the field is set, but not yet fully populated).

Sorry, but i still don't have any way to reliably reproduce this.
*** Bug 84067 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Closing as WORKSFORME.
Please reopen if you get it again with steps to reproduce.
